text: Vidya Balan (pronounced ; born 1 January 1979) is an Indian actress. She was awarded the Padma Shri by the Government of India in 2014. Vidya is known for her roles in Paa (2009), the black comedy Ishqiya (2010), the thrillers No One Killed Jessica and Kahaani (2012), and the biopic The Dirty Picture (2011). ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian stage actors
title: Vidya Balan
